Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: One of our favorite spots in Amsterdam. It's across from a park so we can sit, eat, drink, and watch the kids play. The menu is decent with a variety of sandwiches. The salads are huge and make for a filling meal. ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Lovely cafe next to the canal. Very romantic and cozy. Snacks are good, wine,beer and tasty cocktails. It is not expensive at all. More local than tourist vibe.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Good food, staff with an amazing view of the canals.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Had a really nice lunch at the cafe during the rain. Nice food, nice service, would return again.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Great and relaxed neighbourhood spot. Traditional dutch brown cafe on a quiet square totally local with good bitterballs and cold beer.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: We stopped by here for breakfast and enjoyed ourselves. Pancakes were fresh and authentic. Coffee was yummy. Lots of bacon! Orange juice was freshly made. It's a great location too - right on the canal. It's also great for drinks and ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: A delicious breakfast, the taste wasn't what I'd describe as strong or spicy, it was actually soft, and it goes amazingly well with the calm environment and tranquility of the place and City, the restaurant is in an Amsterdam's typical architecture house,

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Lovely little place next to a canal on Prinsengracht. I had the French red wine. Looooved it. Definitely going for another visit soon.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Great terras with views over the channel livelihood and great bitterballen

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Amazing, charming, tasty as hell. Highly recommended

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Our favourite breakfast place in the city after 7 days! Large menu with many options, good portions, excellent bacon and coffee and nice typical Amsterdam view with a bustle and the canal. They have heaters when it's a little chilly too. Highly recommend.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: beautiful place to enjoying‚Äã your brunch, especially in Spring

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Nice place for a drink outside by the canal.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Nice local bar for a quick pint after work. It's small and cozy inside but it has a good heated outside space. They have the usual choice of industrial Dutch/Belgian beers so do not expect too much in that sense. Borrel food is cheap and of reasonable quality.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Cosy neighbourhood bar with a nice open view to the neighbouring square - this is a great spot to sit down outside under the canopy with the heating lamps on during winter and enjoy a warm drink or beer! ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Lovely food and friendly service.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: A cozy Caf√©/Bar in the corner of this quiet Amstelveld park. Good to enjoy a coffee in a more relaxed way. They also serve food.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Love this charming little corner cafe. We had a fantastic breakfast here on our last morning in Amsterdam and can't wait to go back! They're also open late every night if that's more your thing.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Its a nice little place tucked away in a corner offering a beautiful view of the adjoining canal. The staff is so friendly and you get a comfortable feeling. Guaranteed to have a good time.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Lovely place, really friendly staff and yummy food. I am a tourist so was in need of some advice on where to visit and staff were more than happy to give me suggestions. In the evening time this becomes a lively bar with a warm atmosphere. I recommend this place for breakfast, lunch and drinks to start your night.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Oh was the food bad or what. We ordered cheese and ham plate and it was inedible. The salad was ok but also not great, greens we're wilted and the overall flavor was meh. ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Visited this cafe shortly after arriving in Amsterdam for a quick snack. Got our holiday off to a good start. Friendly service, charming surroundings and good, simple food.

Name: Caf√© Marcella
Review Text: Nice terrace on the canals for a Sunday afternoon drink and snack. I'd recommend a La Chouffe beer with bitterballen. The rest of the menu is of poor quality.  Though it's a typical Amsterdam bar..
